serverPackage

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverPackage.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class defined for server part of the application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.Map<ClientHandler,java.io.PrintWriter> clientPrintWriterMap
      A ConcurrentHashMap which is thread-safe for storing pair of object ClientHandler and PrintWriter.
      private static int PORT
      Port used for server.
      private java.net.ServerSocket server
      Socket running on server.
      private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService threadPool
      A thread pool for managing thread interacting with client side.

    • Constructor Summary

      Server()
      Constructor of Server class.

    • Field Detail

      • PORT

        private static final int PORT
        Port used for server.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • server

        private java.net.ServerSocket server
        Socket running on server.

      • clientPrintWriterMap

        private static java.util.Map<ClientHandler,java.io.PrintWriter> clientPrintWriterMap
        A ConcurrentHashMap which is thread-safe for storing pair of object ClientHandler and PrintWriter. Each ClientHandler has a unique PrintWriter. This map can be considered as the array clients in states of questions.

      • threadPool

        private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService threadPool
        A thread pool for managing thread interacting with client side.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server()
        Constructor of Server class.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Method for starting server.

      • addIntoMap

        public static void addIntoMap(ClientHandler clientHandler,
                              java.io.PrintWriter pw)
        Add a pair of clientHandler and PrintWriter given in param into the map.
        Parameters:
        clientHandler - an object ClientHandler that is the key.
        pw - an object PrintWriter that is the value.

      • sendMessage

        public static void sendMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        Send msg given in param to all clients. This method needs to be synchronized.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to send.

      • isInMap

        public static boolean isInMap(java.lang.String nickname)
        Check if the map already contains a pair which has clientHandler as key and has the property nickname given in param. Method used to see if the nickname is already used.
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname picked by client.
        Returns:
        availability of the nickname.

      • removeFromMap

        public static boolean removeFromMap(ClientHandler clientHandler,
                                    java.io.PrintWriter pw)
        Removes the entry for the specified ClientHandler only if it is currently mapped to the specified PrintWriter.
        Parameters:
        clientHandler - ClientHandler with which the specified PrintWriter is associated
        pw - PrintWriter expected to be associated with the specified ClientHandler
        Returns:
        true if the value was removed

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Function main.
        Parameters:
        args -
